name: Yummy Skin Blurring Balm Powder Flushed - Matte Color for Cheek & Lip
about: What it is:Inspired by our award-winning Blurring Balm Powder, this buildable, soft matte formula blurs and smooths cheek and lip with all day wear...Highlighted Ingredients:- Upsalite: Supports and absorbs excess sebum and sweat while maintaining skin hydration..Ingredient Callouts:Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. It is also vegan, gluten-free, cruelty-free, and comes in recyclable packaging..What Else You Need to Know:This powder is formulated with upsalite technology for unrivaled blurring and oil control. This Swedish technology creates a soft focus, smoothing effect on pores and fine lines. Create the perfect flush of color on cheeks and lips with ease.
ingredients: -Upsalite: Supports and absorbs excess sebum and sweat while maintaining skinu2019s hydration..-Olive-derived Squalane: Supports oil production and diminish visible signs of aging..-Hyaluronic Acid: Promotes skinu2019s hydration...Magnesium Carbonate, Isohexadecane, C13-15 Alkane, Isododecane, Dimethicone, Squalane, Synthetic Wax, Synthetic Candelilla Wax, Kaolin, Tocopheryl Acetate, Linum Usitatissimum (Linseed) Seed Oil, Zingiber Officinale (Ginger) Root Oil, Hydrolyzed Sodium Hyaluronate, Glyceryl Behenate, Limnanthes Alba (Meadowfoam) Seed Oil, Microcrystalline Wax/Cera Microcristallina/Cire Microcristalline, Polyethylene, Stearoxy Dimethicone, (+/-): Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891),  Iron Oxides (Ci 77491, Ci 77492, Ci 77499), Yellow 5 (Ci 19140), Red 6 (Ci 15850), Red 28 (Ci 45410), Blue 1 (Ci 42090).
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:. It's as simple as SWIRL, PRESS, TAP to BLEND & BLUR. . -Swirl your fingers or a brush into the color.  .- Then, press onto your cheeks & lips. . - Next, tap and blend for a fearless flush.. -Repeat this step as many times as youu2019d like to build color.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love love love this blush! Super pigmented and creamy. The colors are beautiful and stays on all day. I use a little on my lips too and it looks really pretty.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The best and easiest blush youu2019ll ever use. I love how it smooths and is matte but isnu2019t patchy. I always bring it when I travel because so easy to use with your fingers. You really donu2019t need a brush.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The pigment of these is very intense so apply carefully if you have a lighter skin tone. I put it on my hand then use a brush and it applies beautifully.  I don't usually prefer a matte finish but these do not look sull or dry. And unlike most cream blush they are very long lasting. I also sometimes use them as a base and put a dewier formula on top. I love these but would like to see more shade choices.

reviews.review_title: Primadonna - too pigmented for light tone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love Rose and Brunch - great every day color, pigmentation, how it sinks into skin without creating any residue on the surface, and it lasts the whole day. Was expecting a bit of a pop of color from Primadonna, but oh boy it's way too pigmented for light skin tone. No matter how microscopically small amount I applied, it gave me clown cheeks. Sadly, will be returned.

reviews.review_text: Very pigmented, a beautiful colour and creamy consistency.  It dries down to a stain. I usually apply it under my base because it can be hard to blend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favorite makeup find of 2024. I use on cheeks only. I have never had a blush last as long or look as natural, until I tried this cream formula. I have it in Rosu00e9 N Brunch, Dancing Queen, Jubilee, Red Velvet and Spiced Latte. I now use powder blushes only to set THIS. Not that it needs setting, with the matte powder-like finish that nothing sticks to. Note that this is INSANELY pigmented, so I have to apply with a dual-fiber stippling brush (not fingertips), I barely touch the pot with my brush and I immediately start blending. Truly a great product, I can see why it won Allure Best of Beauty.

reviews.review_title: Innovative but didnu2019t work for me
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have oily skin with pores and texture, so I figured this would be a great cream blush for my makeup routine. First off, the formula is quiet innovative and impressive and I think DM is doing amazing things for the makeup space. The shade is beautiful and color payoff is great as well. But my issue with this blush is the same as the blurring balm powder. If you oily skin then this technology can work really well, but if you struggle with DEHYDRATED skin in addition to being oily, then this product may not be for you. Because it is so mattifying and blurring, it clung to my texture and pores, and ended up being super patchy and hard to blend in. Unfortunately, this was a disappointment, but I do still think Danessa is doing amazing work and creating products that arenu2019t just copy and paste from other brand formulas.

reviews.review_title: BELLISSIMO BELLINI! THIS BLUSH IS MAGICAL!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I am 43 & do not wear makeup often, but when I do, I just love a peachy cheek to give my light skin some color & accentuate my baby blues. I always avoid cream blushes because I have VERY oily skin, some redness/acne scarring & large pores, for they always add more unwanted oil/shine, & accentuate pores, YUCKY. My go-to tarte clay blush ran out months ago, so when I recently came on my Sephora app to get more, I opted to look at other options before purchasing. I came across this Yummy Skin Blurring Balm Blush from DANESSA MYRICKS BEAUTY, which is a newer cosmetic company I have never heard. Although it is a cream formula, after reading all the promising wonderful things this does, such as oil reducing, mattifying, & actually blurring pores & fine lines (not just filling in), I skeptically decided to give this a try. Due to my light skin tone & other features, I went w/Bellini, a poppy golden peach.  Ladies, especially my 40+ mature oily skin crew, this cream to matte POWERHOUSE of a blush ACTUALLY does EVERYTHING it says it does, & BEYOND! Not only does it glide on smooth, it actually blurs pores instead of filling & accentuating them, & finishes to a soft, non-cakey matte w/long lasting GORGEOUS color.    I definitely found my new go-to blush (bye tarte, it's been a decent 6 years). If you're not sure what shade to get, they even have a chart that recommends shades for your skin tone range w/modeled images. BRAVO DMB, BRAVO! I now have to check out their other products, for if they work as wonderfully promised as this does, you have me sold.   In my picture, snapped 4 hours AFTER application & WITHOUT photoshop, I prepped w/my usual toner(Claudaile works MAGIC) & moisturizer(MUDMASKY Serum Moisturizer), then MILK Pore Eclipse Mattifying Primer & Laura Mercier Tinted Oil-Free Skin Perfector Moisturizer before applying blush. Oh, & brows by REFY Palmade, filling in my scarce, thin brows beautifully.  DO NOT HESITATE, BUY THIS MAGIC-IN-A-BLUSH NOW!

reviews.review_title: WOW on mature skin IF you practice good skincare!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, gray hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I rarely write reviews as Iu2019m a tough critic. Iu2019m wearing no foundation in my photo, just Dior concealer under my eyes, Dancing Queen on my lips/cheeks and Universal in my t-zone. Any questions?   After reading what other people are saying, I agree that this project is absolutely incredible IF you are bringing your skincare routine A-game to the party. I absolutely LOVE it, but I can see how this product could highlight flaky, dry skin on those who choose to ignore a good skincare routine. So do that first, then try this!   I have insanely sensitive, dry, rosacea-prone and hormonal skin. Iu2019ve been using Bellini, Dancing Queen and the Universal shade and all three products beautifully blur pores and manage my oily t-zone throughout the day. I use the colours on my cheeks and lips, and the universal on my t-zone, chin and forehead. No reaction, no BS and no concealer - see for yourself.   Totally recommend if you incorporate high-quality, regular exfoliation and a proper moisturizer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I own Danessa Myricks Yummy Skin in Universal and I have mixed feelings about it so I was a little hesitant about getting this blush (Bellini) but it looked so gorgeous! I am not disappointed at all! For reference, I am in my mid 40s, have fine lines and wrinkles, enlarged pores and hyperpigmentation. I have normal to dry skin in winter, normal to combo in summer. I applied the blush quite intense and no bronzer so you can see the shade. In one picture I have applied it also as lipstick (disregard the messy application, is to see the color) PROS: - Hello pigment: this is such a pigmented formula! A little goes a long way so it will last forever. - Creamy and silky texture. It has a very pleasant texture, so silky! - Soft matte finish that looks so natural. - It feels hydrating on the skin - Super long lasting: it lasted like just applied the entire day. - So versatile: you can use it as blush and as a gorgeous lipstick. I havenu2019t used it as eyeshadow but it may not even crease because it looked perfect on the lips. - Gorgeous packaging: both the cardboard box it came in and the plastic package look so beautiful and they allow to easily see which is the shade.  - It has great price for the amount of product and its quality.  CONS: - I havenu2019t found any! I am sharing my honest and authentic opinion as a Sephora Beauty Insider Community Ambassador

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This blush is unreal! When they say itu2019s yummy it truly is my skin has never looked juicier and more plump with a blush than this one. It blends into the skin so easily thereu2019s no uneven tone or patchiness. I love that itu2019s easy to use with my fingers and then it doesnu2019t pick up any foundation I already have on. It lasts pretty long on my face throughout the day. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I fell in love with the blurring balm powder so I was REALLY hopeful the blushes would be just as good! Let me tell you, they DID NOT disappoint. They are creamy without really needed another blush to set on top. They stay ALL DAY too. Seriously my dream blush.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love it! This product is super pigmented and glides on like a dream. I have dry skin and unfortunately the complexion product in this range did not work for me. The blush was gifted by Danessa Myricks Beauty, but Iu2019m so excited to report that the blush is spectacular and Iu2019ve had no issues with flaking. I like that it can be used anywhere. My advice would be to use a light hand when applying. Itu2019s buildable, but you can also easily correct. I love how the shade Bellini looks on my NC42 skintone. Highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: After reading many of the reviews, I was expecting this blush to be SUPER pigmented. I got the soft terracotta shade Jubilee, and I honestly feel like it is the perfect amount of pigment. You can build it up for a punch of color on the cheeks, but donu2019t be intimidated thinking the pigment is too muchu2014 it does blend out! Iu2019m pretty pale, and I can easily sheer out the color so it doesnu2019t look ridiculous on me. Because of the versatility of the pigment level, I feel like the formula truly can work for many skin tones. My only issue so far is that the blush can look patchy on my skin. I have to carefully place and blend the blush for it to not get patchy. I wish itu2019d be a little more effortless to work with, but maybe I havenu2019t figured out the best application method yet!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this brand and I was very excited to try this new launch. I got the bright pink shade Primadonna which is beautiful. Itu2019s pigmented but not too pigmented. Itu2019s also buildable and very easy to blend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this blush! It definitely blurs the skin and creates such a soft and dewy look. The formula is great, feels light and easily blendable. Works over and under foundation, just depends on whether you want a subtle look or not. My only qualm is that the shade was more yellowish than the photo portrayed it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted by Danessa Myricks their new Yummy Skin Blurring Balm Powder Flushing shade Primadonna and it is one of the most beautiful blushes Iu2019ve ever had the pleasure of using!! It blends in like a dream and the color is so pigmented and looks great on my fair skin! Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: gorgeous color! interesting formula since itu2019s cream to powder, blends beautifully onto the skin and buildable. the color stays vibrant too as i find that some cream blushes get muddled with my foundation & concealer

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was so excited to try the Yummy Skin Blurring Balm Flushed. This is my first time trying this brand, and I'm really impressed. This product was super easy to blend with my makeup. I can't wait to try every color. gifted by Danessa Myricks Beauty

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by Danessa Myricks Beauty: Iu2019m normally not a cream blush person, but these are SO beautiful and totally unique! You get the blendability of a cream with the finish of a powder. They are also super pigmented, so a little goes a long way! I love the shade Bellini and want to try more!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful product. Blends effortlessly with build able coverage. If youu2019re new to using a cream blush, I think youu2019ll have a pleasant experience. This is my first time trying her brand and was thoroughly impressed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by Danessa Myricks beauty. I love a good matte blush, and this one in Bellini is a winner! Amazing pigmented formula, super easy to blend. Lasts long and look gorgeous! Love it, i want to try it in other shades

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am in love of this yummy skin I have been using it for my everyday makeup look, it so easy to use I love the formula, i use in my lips and cheeks , it blending perfectly, very pigmented. I highly recommend it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This blush is really top tier. Itu2019s beyond pigmented and I feel like every girl needs this blush for the spring/summer to bring a pop of color to their look!!! I canu2019t wait to see what other new products they come out with.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a really pretty lip and cheek product. Itu2019s quite easy to blend but is also buildable and doesnu2019t move around once it sets. It feels like a nice natural finish and isnu2019t to sticky or oily but also not drying!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Rosu00e9 N Brunch - neutral rosey pink
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First of the shades are gorgeous. My shade was complementing my skin color. Itu2019s an interesting texture. This is my first time using a balmy blush kit. Itu2019s kinda fun. It gives a nice glow and blends well with my foundation. Good choice and nice colors.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing product and itu2019s multiuso. Itu2019s a cream blush that you can use on your lips and itu2019s super creamy. The color is amazing and bright. I really like it! Please if you buy it buy the pink color. Cute.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: THE BEST blurring blush! It always looks like Iu2019m truly blushing from within! And it makes my cheeks look smooth!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Rosu00e9 N Brunch - neutral rosey pink
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was so happy to try this new blurring blush gifted by danessa myricks beauty. I like the shade I picked a lot and itu2019s very easy to blend and apply and also extremely pretty and use it almost everyday now

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Rosu00e9 N Brunch - neutral rosey pink
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The yummy skin blurring balm powder is such a cute blush! Love that youu2019re able to use it both on your cheeks and lips. Itu2019s super easy to use, you can use it with your fingers or with a brush. All the shades are so pretty as well!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m a blush lover through and through, so when I say that this stunner does not disappoint, I mean it!! The pigment is absolutely incredible and the formula offers a flawless blend that feels like it might be missing on the market. A little goes a long way, so itu2019s definitely something that will last you for quite sometime. It doesnu2019t settle into texture or pores, which is another added bonus. Overall, huge fan and hope more shades are released asap!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: it is now my indispensable product, so velvety easy to apply and ultra pigmented, very little is needed to have well-valued cheeks. as in the photo, I also used it for the eyes and lips and I love it very much. I love applying it with a fluffy brush, but if I'm in a hurry even dabbing with my fingers gives a great result

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: These are really pigmented and I like the cream formula! I wish the color range was a little bit wider but they have a lot of beautiful colors for deeper skin tones which is amazing! I do feel like it's a bit hard to blend but once it does it looks so good!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Sooo happy I got this blurring balm! Like what everyone else said, itu2019s pigmented and the color is easily buildable. Lasts all day and feels great on the skin. I also love how you can use it on your lips!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This blush is sooo good. I have dry sensitive skin and I love it. Itu2019s hydrating, buildable, blends easily, and looks amazing on the skin. Not only can you wear this as a blush but you can also wear it on your lips and eyes. I cannot wait to try other colors!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is so beautiful! Itu2019s rich in pigment and a little goes a long way! I have also noticed it stays all day long. My cheeks stay pigmented and beautifully flushed. It wears well over liquid makeup and even powders.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This flushed balm is AMAZING. I didn't think too much when I first opened the tub, but believe me when I tell you that this stuff is pigmented. I'm still learning the right amount for different looks. It's truly a great product and I'm OBSESSED. I can't believe how bright and creamy this is. Gifted by Danessa Myricks.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Danessa Myricks gifted me this product free in exchange for an honest review. YOU. NEED. IT. The blush is out of this world with the formula. It is SO pigmented and beautiful. Once I got through the top layer I couldnu2019t believe the amount of pigment coming off on to my beauty blender. Itu2019s so luminous looking when you first apply I donu2019t really notice it being that matte. Definitely will repurchase

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got the shade Bellini and itu2019s perfect for my medium skin tone. I received this product for free. The formula is beautiful. It blends so well on top of my makeup and it stays all day. Itu2019s also great for adding a little pop of color on my eyelids too and as a tint for lips.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This blush is super cute! I love it for days when I want to have a lighter makeup look! It blends so nicely.  I recommend this product 100%!!! I will be using it on an upcoming trip! It has such cute packaging as well!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I saw so many youtubers give this rave reviews but it's so patchy and hard to work with for me. The colour rose and brunch is also said to be super natural looking but I don't get why cause it's a pretty pigmented like reddish pink. I think if you wear foundation all over your face you may be able to lay this down as a primer and it could look good as a glow from within.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This blush is so SUPER pigmented, I got the color Primadonna and it goes very well with my medium olive tone skin , it is truly blurring and softening, it gives a gorgeous flush effect and a little goes a LONG way! Gifted By Danessa Myricks Beauty

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: it feels so velvet like almost a borderline silicone texture, it looks super smooth on the lips!! i love using it when iu2019m done w my makeup (on top of full face makeup) rather than using it like a cream blush. also love how pigmented they are but able to sheer out! (picture i added im wearing PRIMADONNA on cheeks/lips)

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Rosu00e9 N Brunch - neutral rosey pink
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the pigment and the creamy texture. This is my new favorite blush. I also used it as an eyeshadow and loved it. Cute packaging too. 100% recommend this blush. The shipping was super quick too. Love

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by Danessa Myricks and I already have yummy skin foundation and balms in my kit as a professional makeup artist and use it often. So needles to say I was excited to receive this product. I had honest intention to add this to my makeup kit as well, but the color and texture was so perfect for myself that I have decided to u201cstealu201d it for personal use and It has become my go to.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Rosu00e9 N Brunch - neutral rosey pink
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product. Itu2019s just the right size to carry in my purse. I especially like the smooth application form with just enough pop of color.. I was happy with this What a lovely color! Very complimentary and not at all overwhelming.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Complimentary from Danessa Myricks beauty. I got the shade Jubilee and it is a beautiful terracotta shade. I don't typically go for matte blushes cause I like a youthful glow to my skin but that doesn't mean I don't wear this. This is one I'll definitely wear. The cream to powder formula is so comfortable, blurring and the pigment is gorgeous. I don't get any patchiness either and it's longwear. She did good !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This formula is so innovative. It begins as a balm and converts into powder. Itu2019s so easy to blend and give a beautiful matte finish. I love I can also use it on my lips. Itu2019s also long wearing, soft and buildable. When applying this balm, it looks smooth, blurring, hydrating, and texture reducing. I have combination skin and this balm contains upsalite, which absorbs excess oil and sweat.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely loved this product!! Balm is SO pigmented and creamy, DM did her thing here. I was gifted the product but I would definitely purchase every shade.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this cream blush. It has such a unique texture that is perfect for a dewy skin look but still blurs imperfections and doesn't get oily throughout the day. The peachy shade is absolutely perfect for a sunkissed, natural look. Gifted by Danessa Myricks Beauty for review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: By far one of my favorite artist & makeup brands so when Danessa Myricks drops a new product you pay attention! The Yummy Skin Blurring Balm Flushed is a wonderful kit addition, itu2019s light weight but buildable so getting your desired color pay out is pretty easy, and the blurring effect it provides is a genius touch in addition to it giving a matte finish which is my preference. It also gives an effortless flush of color to the cheeks & of course like most of her gems can be used multiple ways even on the lips. I opted for this shade because itu2019s warmer & gives me kind of a bronzy build that I can use alone or with other products I layer  Itu2019s soft but gives that photo finished pop of color that we all love. This is something Iu2019ll keep in my kit, because it certainly will be utilized!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was sent this product complimentary from Danessa Myricks Beauty. This blush is BEAUTIFUL. I have oily skin so I used to lean toward powder blushes and bronzers but lately, I've been a huge fan of cream formulas. I love the peachy orange color BELLINI on my light/medium skin tone, it applies smoothly with or without a full face. I do wish the packaging was a flip top vs having the cover completely twist off (not very travel formula). I'm so excited to try more from this company!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Complimentary from Danessa Myricks Beauty. This blush is so beautiful. The balm to powder formula is gorgeous. I love how it just naturally blurs into the skin. I really like the matte finish, it looks very natural. I also love that it's buildable. It wears very well throughout the day. The shade is lovely and it would look beautiful on any skin tone. The ingredients are very impressive. I love that I can easily apply it with my fingers and also buff it out with a brush.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Rosu00e9 N Brunch - neutral rosey pink
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by Danessa Myricks Beauty. This blush is super pigmented! Itu2019s a cream blush that blends well and has a matte finish. A little goes a long way. My only complaint is the range of shades. The formula itself is amazing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love that this blush is so blendable and I can just put my sponge in it and tap it on my face to create a perfect shade! If I want more I just make it a little heavier. Every shade looks great on my complexion!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cream blush is absolutely beautiful. I received this product complimentary from Danessa Myricks (thank you!). It is very pigmented and a little goes a long way. I love how seamlessly it blends into the skin creating such a glowing blush moment. I got the shade Primadonna which is a gorgeous hot pink in the pan but can be blended out on the cheeks for a more natural look. But if you feel like creating a colorful blush look, this product with definitely give it to you. This is already a favorite product in my collection in the short time I've had it. It is stunning!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ll just start this review by saying that Danessa Myricks makes amazing products. This is no exception. Such an innovative and beautiful formula for a cream blush. I love the packaging too. Blends easily and great shades.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this complimentary from Danessa Myricks in exchange for my honest review.  The formulation is one that is mind-blowing where it starts off creamy and dries to a powder. The pigmentation is excellent, a little goes a long way. The shade Primadonna is a vibrant hot pink but applies on gorgeously to give the perfect rosey blush. This would work on many skin tones.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Woweee! So impressed with the beautiful color payoff and creamy texture. I have olive skin and this shade adds the perfect peachy glow. I just dab a tiny bit on my cheeks and even to my lips. So beautiful!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this blush so much! It blends amazingly and it lasts throughout the day. The coverage is great too my blush doesnu2019t fade . I love pairing it with a powder blush over it . I definitely recommend !!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This blush deserves all the hype! It doesn't take much product to give you beautifully, pigmented, cheeks. It blends out amazingly well and on me (dry skin with a bunch of dewy base products) it lasts all day. It actually looks better on my skin as the day goes on! Kindly gifted by Danessa Myricks.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: So far I really like this blush. Itu2019s extremely pigmented, I have the shade Bellini and it is beautiful. I like to apply it with a brush rather than sponge or fingers. The only down side is that after hours it becomes patchy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This cream to powder blush and lip color is super pigmented. I first tried applying it to my cheeks with a brush and it came out SO BOLD that I had to start over. I prefer patting it on with my fingers, and just one or two taps provide enough to blend out into a nice, vibrant flush. The product  contains wax, which gives it a kind of grease paint consistency in the pot, but it dries down quickly on the skin to a matte, powdery finish. Gifted by Danessa Myricks Beauty.

reviews.review_title: Very pigmented, non greasy, very long lasting!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was very afraid to try a cream blush because I donu2019t like the feel of greasy skin. I was worried that creams would feel like Vaseline on my face but this blush surprisingly performs well and sets in place once blended! It has a creamy texture at first but once you rub it in it will set I place and wonu2019t feel greasy at all. Itu2019s super pigmented so be careful how much you apply. My first time using it I applied too much and I quickly learned that less is more with this product. This blush lasts a very long time and doesnu2019t budge. The matte finish is great and looks natural. The shade Primadonna is a beautiful poppy red with a cool pink undertone. It really brings my face to life with how bright and beautiful it is. Love this blush and I know itu2019s going to last me a long time. Highly recommend these!

reviews.review_title: Excellent blush for my combo complexion!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I just got this blush in shade Jubilee. It is excellent for my light to medium combo skin complexion. It has great pigmentation, a little is just needed and builds up beautifully and blends even better. CaCannot wait to try other shades

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: What a vibrant wash of plum! Love at first sight! I immediately opened it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve tried Danessa Myricks Vision Flush before and it has become a fave of mine so I was really excited to have been able to this Yummy Skin Blurring Balm Powder Flushed. I got the shade Jubilee which is a soft terracotta shade and I am INLOVE! I love how easy it blends to the skin & you look so natural with this on! I definitely need to try all of their products now as I am completely obsessed! *Gifted by Danessa Myricks Beauty but all opinions are my own and based on experience.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the most beautiful blush I have ever used. It goes on like a cream and dries down as a powder. The formula is super pigmented and just so beautiful!! Everything that I have tried from the brand has been just amazing!!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a great blush! Love the cute packaging and the nice color that's buildable and natural while being not too over the top. I think it's great for summer and fall. The proprietary formula is nice too, which turns from a creamy texture to more of a soft powdery consistency that helps blur pores. The longevity on my combo skin is pretty good too and it makes me want to try other products from the brand! *Gifted by Danessa Myricks Beauty

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The flushed powder had me speechless! This formula is different from anything Iu2019ve tried! This looked so beautiful on my cheeks and it was definitely long wearing! I used this on my bride this past weekend and it looked phenomenal

The color pay off and application of this product is amazing. Looks like skin, lays beautifully on top of foundation and any other products you apply. I recommend apply it with a duo fiber brush for a light application or a full color pay off with a more compact bristle brush.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love a good blush these days especially a cream based one. This blush is so gorgeous (I got the shade Jubilee) I love how easily this blush applies and blends. Itu2019s very hydrating and doesnu2019t enhance texture. Perfect blush for my everyday makeup routine!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted by Danessa Myricks Beauty their yummy skin blurring balm flushed in the shade primadonna. Wow can I say, this is pigmented!!! I did choose a bright shade but I love how it looks on my skin. Itu2019s not super dewy but gives a soft matte finish. So pretty

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This item was gifted and I love the product! The color is so vibrant. It is so easy to apply! I just use my fingers to apply and it glides on like a dream! If I want it to be darker, I can just build on the color. Itu2019s so great! Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This blush is sooo stunning for that dewy effortless makeup look. It blends in so nicely with the rest of my makeup and sits so well all day. It looks like the perfect flush of color. I love how seamlessly it blends into my skin. This was gifted by Danessa Myricks Beauty but thoughts are my own!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Complimentary from Danessa Myricks Beauty.I received the shade Bellini which a poppy golden peach. The formula is quite nice and quite pigmented, a little goes a long way. I like dabbing it on using my finger and building it up, then finishing with a brush. It is trial and error at first to discover the best way to use it. It  gives a nice soft flush on the skin which is pretty. I prefer using it as blush but it is a nice color on the lips too not drying but not as long lasting. Quite nice.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product was gifted to me by Skeepers in exchange for my honest review. I have the shade Primadonna and the pigment is a LOT more than I am used to. You just need the smallest amount. I recommend using your finger to initially tap the pigment on, and then using a clean brush to blend it out. The formula is quite nice, as it is a balm so it is easy to pick up on your finger, and then it blends onto the skin very matte. If you are looking for a long lasting blush, this is it! I am giving 4 stars since it was a bit challenging to work with because it is overly pigmented and I had to remove my base twice before actually figuring it out. I intend to buy a lighter shade which will hopefully work on my skin tone more! Primadonna is very deep.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: okay honestlyu2026 this is spectacular. one of the BEST cream blushes iu2019ve ever tried in my entire life. the formula is buttery smooth and really does seem to blur the skin underneath. it plays well with setting powder. itu2019s easy to build up, but even more importantly, itu2019s easy to apply *as little as you want*  u2014 i find that with cream blushes, itu2019s very easy to overdo it. the shades are stunning. the longevity is bar none. iu2019m blown away and frankly tempted to buy every other shade. bravo bravo bravo xoxo

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not going to life with my super fair skin I was a little worried when I saw the color in the packaging but it blends so nice and a little goes a really long way. I love that you can apply with brush or fingers in a pinch! I only used as a blush so I canu2019t comment in the lip wear area but totally recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wow!!!! Best new innovative beauty product on the market 2023. Another homerun by Danessa Myricks.  I purchased three different shades.  I am thoroughly satisfied with the texture and intense formulated pigmentation. The formula is very buildable. You can apply a little or a lot. Whatever your prefence, you will not be disappointed. I definitely plan to snatch up the orher three shades to add to my aresnal of this brand amazing products. Remember the main key with these products is to find what application works for you. There is no right or wrong just have fun and love the reflectoon that you see in the mirror. Oh did i say run for this? For the people in the back RUN don't walk. LOL!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It comes in pretty packaging, the formula is silky smooth. Nicely blends into the skin and is quite pigmented (a little goes a long way). It's buildable too. I feel it blends best with fingers. Gives a smooth natural look to the face and lips, and my lip's wrinkles look less visible after using this. This was the first time trying Danessa Myricks product and I am impressed! Will love to try more products from them!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin

The pigmentation is unreal - a little goes a long way but if you put too much it blends out very easily. This doesnu2019t lift my makeup underneath and gives the skin a beautiful finish. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was gifted by Danessa Myricks Beauty in exchange for my honest review. The formula is very creamy and buildable. I tried this both on the cheeks and lips and found that rubbing/blending instead of dabbing the product, applied better. When I dabbed it, the product applied patchy but rubbing made it have a much more blended and blurred finish. On the lips It feels incredibly lightweight and I even forgot I had anything applied. I also found it had very little to no transfer when I kissed the back of my hand. Great quality and i will definitely be putting some of the other shades on my wishlist!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is so pigmented. I feel like this is what rare beauty thinks it is. But seriously, a little goes a long way. The color pops against my skin. No complaints! I prefer this over my overhyped rare beauty blush.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love blush, all shades and formulas but Iu2019m pale so I can look like a clown if a blush is to pigmented. But this blush is AMAZING. Absolutely stunning and a dream to work with. Iu2019ve already ordered another shade.

reviews.review_title: Gorgeous tone on tan to deep skin for sure
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The Danessa Myricks blushes are so beautiful on the cheeks, lips and I even tried on the eyes! The technology behind it is absolutely amazing! reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Ok, this takes a little learning to perfect. It's very pigmented. I used a damp beauty sponge and lightly dabbed, absolutely start where you want the most pigment. Not a bad idea to dab on back of hand first. Once you figure out what works for you it's gorgeous. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_title: A little goes a LONG way, very pigmented!

Would love more colors in the future! 10/10 recommend.  Bonus: I tried this on without ANY base makeup and it made me look like I was ready to go for the day. Love this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Rosu00e9 N Brunch - neutral rosey pink

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Danessa does it again. One of the most unique and innovative cream blushes Iu2019ve ever used. It has a balmy texture that turns a bit melty and then sets down to a matte powder finish. Once applied to the cheeks they blend quite nicely but when they set they set so I would recommend working one cheek at a time. Because these set down to that blurred powder finish, the lasting power is incredible. They last all day giving you a flushed, blurred and beautiful cheek. They are also extremely pigmented so start small and add intensity as you like. I love the brightness and vibrancy of the colors and would love to see a shade expansion for more muted dusty shades as well since the formula is fantastic. They also look and wear really nicely on the lips. Overall a great versatile product that can be worn for a gorgeous monochromatic look!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the first time I have every tried a product like this, and I was very pleasantly surprised! The color was light but buildable and looked very natural on the skin. I found it applied best with my fingertips and then blended in with a damp beauty blender as needed. I would love to get more colors soon!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Itu2019s so blurry and so beautiful so blend wool long wearing this blush is like no other blush. Iu2019ve tried on the market. I am absolutely blown away by the formula and its uniqueness. I donu2019t see any other blush coming out with such a phenomenal formula.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Yummy Skin Balm Powder is my first Danessa Myricks product and it did not disappoint! I got the shade Jubilee which looks beautiful on my medium skin tone. What I love about this balm is that it goes on opaque but easily blends out and gives a more natural finish. I also love that the formula is easily buildable if I want my blush to stand out more. I wore this all day yesterday and it stayed on without moving. I think the price point is reasonable too since this can also be used on the lips.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This formula is AMAZING! Itu2019s definitely perfect for any skin type! Love it has the perfect amount of pigments and the colors are GORGEOUS! Itu2019s a must have plus the price is great! Definitely worth it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Yummy skin blurring blush blew me away. The product glides on my checks so easily and it looks so amazing! Itu2019s very buildable and soft on the skin. My skin is left glowing after I apply. The blush also lasts all day and night!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This blush gives off such a beautiful matte color! I just use my fingers to blend it out. This is a great formula. It helps blur out imperfections on your skin! I was afraid it would clog up my pores but it didnu2019t. Itu2019s gorgeous!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I didn't expect to love this shade as much as I did. While I love the original Yummy Skin Balm Powder formula, I didn't know what to expect from a blush version. However, I like the smooth feeling that this blush gives my skin, I like the satin finish, and I like how a little bit of this product goes a massively long way. (I only used the tiniest amount, andu2014even thenu2014I could've used less than I actually did!) My only gripe (as a pro makeup artist) is that I would like to see an expanded shade range with vibrant reds, deeper oranges, and maybe other variations of pink suitable for deeper skin tones; I feel like Primadonna and Dancing Queen would be the only shades to *really* show up on my deeper clients. Other than that, I do enjoy the blush formula and how it wears on my skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my first product from Dynessa Myricks and I definitely want to try more.  This blush is vibrant, pigmented, and goes on smooth. I love experimenting with makeup and layering powder over cream products. This blush works great for that flawless finished look. Definitely recommend! Gifted by Danessa Myricks Beauty.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: With so many brands doing u201cmulti sticksu201d and u201cmulti purpose balmsu201d I was hesitant to get too excited about this product and knew my expectations were going to be high.  I wasnu2019t expecting to be completely wowed by the Yummy Skin Blurring Balm, but I absolutely am! This has the perfect shade, itu2019s a very natural looking flush and it doesnu2019t displace my base makeup when I apply it. I love that it has a slightly dewy look, itu2019s perfect for a more natural finish that gives you that healthy looking glow! This has quickly become my most reached for blush product, and I love the hint of warmth it gives when I apply it over my lipstick toou2014it gives the perfect monochromatic vibe when used all over. This one is absolutely the quality you would expect from a brand like Danessa Myricks! This balm was gifted by Danessa Myricks Beauty for the purpose of product feedback.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Rosu00e9 N Brunch - neutral rosey pink
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was my first time trying a cream blush and I love it! It is a beautiful, natural color and a little bit goes a long way. I can also be used as an eyeshadow or even lip tint. Iu2019m excited to experiment with it more in the summer for a dewy look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this blush complimentary from Danessa Myrick. Iu2019m obsessed with all things blush so I was so excited to try this one out! This formula is so unique but in a good way. Itu2019s super pigmented so go light and blends like a dream! I need every shade stat!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a nice terracotta shade but itu2019s a very light pigment. I prefer that itu2019s not super pigmented since you can build it up to a light or bright blush on your cheeks. Wear lasted all day for me. Love it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got the shade Golden Hour. It is gorgeous. It is highly pigmented and works like magic. It is creamy when you first apply it, and after blending, it changes to a matte finish. It feels so light on the lips and cheeks. The product is long-lasting. I am in love with the formula and will be getting more shades.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I use this balm on my lips and cheeks and it gives me flawless look. I like its soft matte and buildable formula and its amazing how it blurs the pores.  I received this product complimentary from Danessa Myricks Beauty.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received Danessa Myricks Yummy Skin blurring bomb to try out and review. The formula is very creamy and pigmented! You can flush it out for a very natural look OR layer it for something bold and creative. I believe this product can work on all skin tones, and itu2019s extremely versatile! I live off of liquid and cream blushes, and this genuinely is one of my favorite formulas!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely in love with this product! Super pigmented and looks gorgeous on cheeks. Does give a blurring effect. So i feel like if you had texture it would disguise somewhat. Wears well all day. Super easy to apply. I need all the shades!!Complimentary from Danessa Myricks Beauty.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Rosu00e9 N Brunch - neutral rosey pink
reviews.review_text: This blush is insane! The pigment is so strong, you need to literally lightly tap your brush inside to pick up some color. It is absolutely gorgeous and the combo formula of wet and dry lays beautifully on your skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was gifted by Danessa Myricks. After having tried what feels a million blushes in my lifetime I was still very excited to test out the newest addition that Danessa Myricks has come up with. Mainly because the shades are very uncommon and so versatile. I adored the terracotta shade I picked out! it blends out easily and wear time is fantastic.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I saw this and instantly thought it would be great . I am on such a cream blush kick lately. I wanted it but all the shades were sold out . it is a very unique formula ,  beautiful. packaging , feels very luxurious , looks like a balm but when you touch it is really a cream , so very pigmented , you literally need a drop . The colour is gorgeous , very bright , bordering too bright maybe . I will play with it a little to see the best application method, trying it today to see the wear of it , but I enjoy it .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary from Danessa Myricks Beauty. This blush makes my cheeks look flawless! The blurring effect really makes your pores look airbrushed. I love how it can be applied on top of powder without anything moving underneath and how it sets to a matte finish. the color range is gorgeous too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Definitely a pretty finish but itu2019s extremely pigmented and hard to blend out. Using a sponge provided the best results versus hands and brushes. I think the colors are very flattering but I think Iu2019ll stick with more liquid blushes that blend easily.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Received this product complimentary from Danessa Myricks Beauty and loved it! The blush is super pigmented and a gorgeous shade. I would definitely recommend it especially for brown skin tones because it provides a gorgeous flushed look. It does take a bit of time to get used to and going in with a brush is definitely not the way to go about it because you will pick up way too much product but is gorgeous and easy to use when you get the hang of it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am loving the texture of this blush on my skin.  The color is so natural.  It has a great texture for spreading on the skin.  It's very pigmented, I like to apply it with a duo fiber brush, as this gives a more natural skin effect.  I'm using it almost every day.  The color is perfect.  I am in love with this blush.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Rosu00e9 N Brunch - neutral rosey pink
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Danessa Myricks products have my heart and that includes this new Yummy Skin Blush. The blush is very pigmented so you only need a little bit of product to create a beautiful flushed look. Itu2019s very blendable and takes no time to melt into the cheeks. On top of that, the shade Rosu00e9 N Brunch is such a gorgeous shade! Compared to the other cream blushes that I have used, this one is in the running for my favorite.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The component is so luxurious looking and love that I can see the shade on the front. The formula is so creamy, can easily be applied with it fingers or a brush. I love the way it sets on the skin. I need more shades!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: One thing that I love a good cream blush and this one is at the top. I really enjoy how blendable this is. Itu2019s easy to buildup and leaves the pretty flush on the cheeks. I also love that this can be used on the lips! This is perfection!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Wow talk about beautiful pigments! The packaging and way the product is potted is so beautiful. I applied the product with a brush and it worked well, not patchy on me. Also looks beautiful on the lips!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is such an interesting blush and lip product. The texture is nice and mattefying and this is such an everyday product. Unfortunately I picked a wrong shade that is too orange for my skintone. I would recommend this blush color to deeper skintones.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this yummy skin blurring balm powder. The color bellini is beautiful (coral peachy shade) a little goes a long way it blurs into this nice matte color without feeling dry on my skin. I love this blurring balm powder for my new make up routine!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE the Blurring Balm Powder, so when I saw these new Blurring Balm Powder Flushed, I knew I would love them!  When I tell you, these are the most no fail type of product???!!  I love to apply them with my fingers the best and Iu2019m a brush gal!  I tap my fingers in the products twice (a little goes a long way) and I tap the product on my cheeks, lips, or eyes to blend it out.  They literally melt into the skin!  I have shades Primadonna, Bellini, and Dancing Queen and I love them all!  I love applying Primadonna on the high points of my cheeks and Bellini on the apples of my cheeks.  Such the perfect combo!  Iu2019ve also been loving Dancing Queen as a lip liner with Primadonna in the center of my lips.  These are truly blurring and do not emphasize texture at all.  In addition, these shades can really work for any complexion.  You definitely need to give these a try!  These threes shades were sent to me from the brand, but I did purchase the remaining three shades because I am so in love with this formulation!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: For reference, my skin is dry. This product is a beautiful multipot kind. I loved it as blush! A little goes an extremely long way and it will wear all day seamlessly without breaking apart. It is weightless and becomes one with the skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this complimentary from the brand. Iu2019ve tried her blurring balm before and this blush did not disappoint. It is extremely pigmented! Iu2019ve gotten so many compliments! It feels like a cream blush but when applied it dries down like a powder. I got the Dancing Queen shade and itu2019s a beautiful plum color. Itu2019s also beautiful on my lips too! Itu2019s almost like a lip stain.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Rosu00e9 N Brunch - neutral rosey pink
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Incredibly pigmented and mattifyingu2014 I had no idea that this was the makings of my new everyday blush. It really does require the slightest touch and blend. And then it smooths out pores while leaving a slight glow.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Kindly gifted by Daneesa Myricksu2014first, I need to get into the shade itself because itu2019s so beautiful!! It looked amazing against my skin and a little really does go a long way. I loved how this instantly elevated my everyday makeup looks and left my skin glowing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a beautiful creame to powder formula. I have the shade Golden Hour which is a bright orange red blush. This shows up beautifully on my skin and maintains its vibrancy.  Pairs beautifully with the rest of the Yummy Skin line.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This color is beautiful! Itu2019s a perfect everyday blush and hydrates my dry lips. A little goes a long way. You can use just your fingers and still get a beautiful finish look.  Gifted by Danessa Myricks Beauty

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the color of the blush! Such a beautiful color pay off and easy to blend! I couldnu2019t be happier plus the color lasted throughout the day. I couldnu2019t recommend this enough and plan on purchasing more colors!

reviews.review_title: Divine Formula. I want other colors.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was gifted by Danessa Myricks Beauty and I absolutely loooove this blush. The formula is divine. I got the shade Golden Hour which I was afraid might be too bold or pigmented, but it definitely wasn't! I have a light-medium skin tone and was able to sheer it out. I'm planning to try it on my best friend who has a deep skin tone and I suspect it will work on her. It applies seamlessly with either a brush or fingers and lasts all day. It doesn't have a dewy or sticky finish, it just looks like a natural/satin finish on my oily skin. Would highly recommend! I wanna purchase some more toned down colors next.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So very pretty! I got a sample of this blush complimentary from Danessa Myricks Beauty & I'm so glad I chose a pretty wearable shade. Usually Balm or liquids / creams have to be dewy then I fight setting them because the finish is gone. This is perfect for a natural matte.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is my first ever product from this brand & as a black woman, I NEED MORE! The versatility of this product, truly has no limits. They are great on your cheeks, eyes & lips. I love a light flush of color & itu2019s perfect for that. It can even be built up for more color if youu2019re into that & doesnu2019t feel cakey at all. I would definitely recommend this to anyone & I definitely want to try more from this brand soon!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It is a beautiful color. I like the packaging and design. It blends pretty well on my skin with no problem or irritation. I like that it does not leaves my skin feeling dry or oily. It does not have a scent which I like. Gifted by myricks beauty

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The color payoff of this balm is so good. A little really does go a long way. I love the way just adding a little bit of product completely brightens up my look and makes me glow. Iu2019ve been using it every day and feel like it was what was missing in my makeup routine. gifted by Danessa Myricks Beauty

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m so in love with this blush. I didnu2019t expect it to be cream but it is so beautiful on the skin and a little goes a long way. It creates a blurring effect on the cheeks. Itu2019s super easy to apply as well. It also comes in some beautiful shades and is really pigmented. It leaves the cheeks looking nice and refreshed. And it lasts all day.

reviews.review_title: Must add to your beauty routine
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love  the texture and easy application of this product (DANCING QUEEN - Vivid Plum).I love the color. It is definitely a great color for day or night events. My lips feel moisturized and it is a must for me when it comes to using any lip color.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this yummy skin blurring balm , the color is so vibrant and the product itself is so easy to blend and leaves such a nice blurring texture! I really enjoyed using this product and I would definitely recommend it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been gravitating towards natural looking blushes that look like a natural flush tone that layers well on top of just my skin or foundation. I love that this blush looks amazing with or without foundation underneath and it blends like a dream with just my fingers.  It doesn't last all day since I have oilier skin, but if I set it with a powder it lasts a lot longer! It's a great natural rosy color and I love that it adds life to my face without being too harsh. The packaging is also super cute!  This product was complimentary from Denessa Myricks Beauty, but does not impact my opinions.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: When do Danessau2019s products not work? Never!!! Loved this blush , it works amazing like the balm to powder foundation formula! The shades are gorgeous and will be perfect for the upcoming summer season as well!! Can be used both fingers and brush well!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Got this in shade Belliniu2014a golden peach. Super beautiful and bright enough without being difficult to work with. Shows up wonderfully. It is indeed slightly blurring. Love the formula. Easy to apply without overdoing it. Recommended!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The colors are beautiful. The formula is so pigmented!!! A little bit goes such a long way. I will say once blended out it will get patchy if you do it too much. Iu2019m surprised at the amount of product you get in the pan. Gifted by Danessa Myricks Beauty.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Rosu00e9 N Brunch - neutral rosey pink
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was gifted by Danessa Myricks. This is such a wonderful blush! It gives the perfect flush of color and I look refreshed. I love the shade as well. Such a versatile product! I love that I can wear it without makeup too.

reviews.review_title: A must have for oily skin!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Omg this blush formula is amazing! Itu2019s like the blur balm all over again. Perfect for oily skin & lasts all day. I also love how you can apply with your fingers for a no makeup look and with a brush for more pigment. Also all of the shades are flattering for all skin tones which is extremely impressive. Already purchased 2 more shades!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: gifted by Danessa Myricks Beauty It smelss amazing,very creamy.My first time using rhis brand and i was so impressed its so good quality.Its very easy to use and it blends very good.Totally worth it  everyone should try this brand out.Looking forward for many of this brand products.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely stunning pigment! Incredible payoff with only a small swirl of my finger. Love the balm to powder formula & variety of shades. Easily buildable. Big fan of the packaging too. Will be great for travel!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: What a fun blush! The orange color is divine. Pigmented, but after some experimenting found a brush works really well for a light application. So easy to blend and dries to a matte powdery finish. Easy to layer over and under other base products. I have not tried it on the lips yet (hello dry winter lips) but imagine it would be perfect in the summer with a nude lipliner. Love the minimal and sleek packaging too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: gifted by Danessa Myricks - I love the blurring balm powder so much and Danessa's formulas overall and love how pigmented and longwear this blush is! It melts immediately on the finger and a little goes a long way. I always layer cream/liquid blushes with powder blushes and this was beautiful with powder on especially since I have oily skin.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Rosu00e9 N Brunch - neutral rosey pink
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very pretty! I did receive this to review but find it has a similar effect as the Bobby Brown blurring products. Color was really nice and lasted for most of the day without a need for anything out of my ordinary routine.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Rosu00e9 N Brunch - neutral rosey pink
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This blush has quickly become a new favorite of mine. I thought the color was going to be super sheer but it's actually quite pigmented and very buildable. It lasts all day and blends so easily. And again, the shades are GORGEOUS.

reviews.review_title: So flattering and extremely LONG WEAR
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This blush is LITERALLY BOMB! It gives you the perfect effortless blushy cheeks! Itu2019s pigmented and builds up so beautifully! Doesnu2019t disrupt your foundation and concealer, non greasy and matte finish! Great all day wear! Stays in place and bright the whole day which is FANTASTIC!! The color selection is so versatile! Iu2019m literally OBSESSED

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The most perfect blush ! I love to apply it with my fingers and blend it with a brush to build the intensity. My favorite thing about it is that it can be built up on more full coverage makeup days or toned down on no makeup makeup days.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was a little intimidated by the shade in the pan. I was afraid it would be too pigmented on the cheeks and not blend out well. I was fearful for no reason, this formula and color are absolutely stunning. I apply with a synthetic brush and it blends out easily and naturally. This shade gives me a beautiful sunkissed look and doesnu2019t accentuate texture. Definitely a new favorite.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been loving the Yummy Skin Blurring Balm Powder in the shade u201cGolden Houru201d. The shade is a orange/terracotta mix, canu2019t really describe. Lol However, Medium to Deeper Melanin skin will absolutely love this color. Safe to say itu2019s great for all skin tones as well. I have applied the Blush Balm with a brush and with my fingers and the color payoff is incredible either way. You can build the color up for a more intensifying look. Iu2019ve also used the Blush Balm on my eyelids as an eyeshadow base. It dries down to a soft-matte finish, with a healthy subtle glow. Looking forward to trying more colors! Definitely recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: New fave cream blush! First off, this shade is perfection. Such a stunning berry. I also love the formula! Itu2019s blurring and not too dewy so it lasts all day on my skin! I love the range of shades and need to try more!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this formula and this shade!! Even though I think this shade will be perfect in the summer, it will also work well all year long in my opinion. This is PIGMENTED, but it blends out like a dream so itu2019ll you think you have gone over board just keep blending. You can apply this with a brush, fingers or a sponge my preferred method is to tap on with my fingers and then blend it out with a brush. Even though this is a balm, it dries down and looks similar to a powder, but smoother. The price point is perfect for this, honestly I would recommend Ben pay a little bit more it and I definitely want to pick up another shade at some point. Highly recommended.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Rosu00e9 N Brunch - neutral rosey pink
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I normally stick to powder blushes, Iu2019ve only tried one liquid blush. This consistency is very different but I really like it! I love the way it looks on my skin, it truly is matte. Itu2019s very pigmented so I like to put it on my cheeks first then lightly add a BB cream foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is the most beautiful face and lip shade. It is perfect for the sun kissed summer look! I am in love with all orange shades and this one is stunning. I highly recommend this product/shade. Looks beautiful!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product makes my skin look so beautifully sunkissed. It blends easily and I can even apply it with my fingers. Itu2019s cream to powder finish. I love it so much and genuinely can not recommend it enough.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this blush gifted by Danessa Myricks Beauty and it is so pigmented and the finish is so beautiful on the skin. This is going to be my favorite blush in the spring and summer it gives that just left the beach sun kissed effect on your cheeks. I would definitely recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Super vibrant cream blush that blends out perfectly! I love how buildable it is as well & itu2019s definitely for melanin of course!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect for textured skin. It literally smoothing and blurring large pores and old acne scars. Color JUBILEE is beautiful, perfect on my pail skin. Itu2019s weightless, perfect for all day wear. Easy to use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got the shade u201cDancing Queenu201d and itu2019s such a beautiful shade. I have a fair complexion so I mostly enjoy this color on my lips, but it isnu2019t too overpowering or overwhelming. It is extremely lightweight and lasts for a decent amount of time. It doesnu2019t feel sticky or that it is going to clump either.  I also enjoy the smell of the product; it is not super fragrant. It definitely smoothens out my lips and I absolutely am in love!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect blush product! Super versatile, I use it to add warmth to my cheeks but it can also be used to sculpt the cheek bones for a lille extra high cheek bones look. reviews.review_title: Balm or Cream, It's The Best
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product was gifted by Danessa Myricks Beauty.   I received the new Yummy Skin Blurring Balm Powder Flushed in the shade Primadonna. The Primadonna shade is a hot pink color that looks intimidating in the pan, but easily blends out for a natural flush.   This is meant to be used on both cheeks and lips, but for me it will remain a cheek product. This has to be the most unusual in a good way cream blush I have ever tried. They call it a balm instead of cream, and after trying it I understand why. It literally felt like a lip balm when initially applied. But it quickly dries down and lasts.   My one word of warning is that these blushes are highly pigmented, and thats great. While they do blend out, if you have lighter skin you might want to go in with a light hand. And be careful about putting it on bare skin. At least with the shade I tried, I noticed a tendency to stain.   I will absolutely be trying some of the other shades.
