reviews.review_text: I received a complimentary gift from Danessa Myricks and I CANu2019T wait to get more colors!   Good heavens this texture was so easy to apply onto my cheeks and lips.   The matte texture is perfect for my combination skin where it doesnu2019t finish dry and lasts long before I clean it off.  This product instantly brightened my face and gave me an awakened touch.   I havenu2019t traveled to the islands yet, but WOW this color gave me serious golden hour vibes and Iu2019m here for it plus wanting more!   Instantly radiates my skin making me feel a glow.   I know this color will best suit dark skinned girls because I personally believe dark skinned shades wear bright colors bestu2764ufe0f.  This definitely is a win for every skin type and color out there!  A little goes a long way!  Thank you Danessa Myricks!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really love this product because you can apply it with your fingers, brush, or beauty blender, on your cheeks, eyes and lips!!  It gives natural and fresh blush. I have a dry skin and i'm completly in love with cream products from DMB u2665 it doesn't mark my wrinkles and I also use it as a color corrector for my dark circles.

I got pigment Primadonna, which I absolutely love, but when you apply it as a blush it doesnu2019t really blend very well, so not super happy with that, the color looks beautiful on the lips, but again would like it so much more as a lipstick, would be so much easier to apply

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a beautiful blush! Itu2019s a hard pressed, super pigmented balm that can be worn at full pigment or easily sheered out. I got the shade jubilee, which is true to photos. A gorgeous terracotta color. There are so many cream blushes on the market that it can be hard to choose. But my favorite part is how this cream blush dries down u2014 it doesnu2019t move around or transfer at all!!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Rosu00e9 N Brunch - neutral rosey pink
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am obsessed with this blush. It is easy to apply and blends effortlessly. The packaging is absolutely cute and the color is pigmented. I like using it under my foundation for a flawless skin and canu2019t wait to get my hands to try other colors after trying this .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really enjoying the versatility of this one! I was worried Bellini would be to deep for my fair skin tone but the formula is very flexible once you play with the application process. There is also a tone of product, this will last you forever!

reviews.review_title: Must in your make up kit

reviews.review_text: I love the shade is perfect, most important thing is that it hides my pores, controls shine, last long and is very versatile, I use it as an eyeshadow and blends perfectly

It blends into the skin so well & doesnu2019t disappear after some time. It is a very buildable formula and can be applied with your fingers or a brush. Also love the shade range of these blushes!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product as a gift and I honestly really like it! It doesnu2019t really slide off throughout the day and it blends pretty well on top of powders. I love that it isnu2019t greasy at all and the color is a pretty coral-orange.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Rosu00e9 N Brunch - neutral rosey pink

reviews.review_text: My very first Danessa Myricks product ! Ahhhhhh, these are so pigmented and pretty ! A little goes a long way and they blend seamlessly! I definitely want to try some other colors ! I love that they are versatile too !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoyed this blush. It has such a unique concept. Itu2019s cream in the pan and itu2019s super easy to use. It blends beautifully then dries down almost like a powder. Leaves a satin finish. Love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: OK, itu2019s not often that a blush gets me in a chokehold like this one has - I literally applied it as soon as I opened the package and havenu2019t stopped wearing it since! It is the MOST pigmented, long-lasting, & beautifully natural blush Iu2019ve tried, and Iu2019ve tried lots! You need a teeny amount - like a dot on a fingertip - & it blends SO beautifully and looks so natural! I love it SO MUCH, and whatu2019s more, this Rose & Brunch shade works with BOTH cool and warm-toned looks! It has just the right balance of pink & brown so that either is pulled forward depending on your skin tone & what other colors youu2019re wearing that day. LOVE LOVE LOVE!!! Also, donu2019t be confused by the u201cmatte finishu201d description - this does not look dry or powdery, just natural but not shiny.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am in love with the blush as a whole. Starting with the formula (very buttery), to this color specifically. It was super easy to blend even on top of already set complexion products. A little goes a LONG way with this color and the best part is being able to use it on your lips and cheeks

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The romans are just amazing!  I'm so glad I got to try them!  They are incredibly pigmented and come in a very stylish package.  Also the blush is very persistent, I wore it all day!  I am delighted!  highly recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin

Love how it blends easily, stays unmoved when finished with a setting spray. If you are a great blush lover you've got to try this ud83dudc97

I used it on my cheeks and lips and loved it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my absolute new favorite blush. It starts as cream which makes it super blendable and easy to apply then dries down into a powder finish that blurs the face it looks airbrushed. I will definitely be order all the shades!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is THE creamiest blush i have ever used! Super super pigmented, incredible looking! So easy to blend. I HIGHLY recommend this for a gorgeous blush look! It is so pigmented but also easy to blend! A little goes a long way. I want every color!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary from Danessa Myricks Beauty in exchange for my honest review. This was actually the first time hearing of this brand but I was so excited to try it. The packaging is beautiful and I have to say this product feels so smooth and blends so well with a finger or brush.   I am so impressed with the color and it is buildable. The best part is that this product is long-lasting which works well for me as I still wear a face mask here and there, and my current blush tends to wear off. The product has a nice matte finish and lasts all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The flushes are incredibly pigmented, yet super blendable. A little goes a long way. The shade range is fantastic - thereu2019s something for everyone, with neutral, peachy, pink, and even purple! I have three shades and I already want more!! I especially appreciate the blurring capabilities of this formula and I like to apply it on my cheeks and lips. I can even apply the peachy shade under my eyes for colour correcting! I like to use a brush for a more opaque application, or my fingers for a diffused look. Definitely recommend this innovative product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Smooth hydrating balm works perfect for my semi-dry lips.  It glides easily and I can creat different shades depending on my preference for the day.  I love this product also works on my cheeks.  It blends well and doesnu2019t look caky.  An awesome 2 in 1 product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This blush is so pretty. I got golden hour itu2019s a nice orange. It gets smooth and subtle on my face and also my lips. Love how you can use it for both. I like how it applies smooth onto my skin. I thought it would be sticky but it wasnu2019t.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product was gifted by Danessa Myricks Beauty in exchange for my honest review. This cheek and lip duo is amazing! It applies so smoothly, feels comfortable, and blends easily with fingers or a brush. The color payoff is nice and buildable. The matte finish is gorgeous on both my cheeks and lips. While this balm powder is long-lasting on the cheeks, it fades away quickly from my lips. I definitely plan on reaching for this often!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: i absolutely love this balm! if you thought the original skin blurring balm was amazing, just wait until you try out the flushed balm! it looks so flawless and smooth on my skin, and it's so pigmented!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Rosu00e9 N Brunch - neutral rosey pink

reviews.review_text: Absolutely obsessed with this! I noticed an instant blowing affect when I applied it to my cheeks. I also put it on the tip of my nose and on my lips for a uniform color all over my face. The product is easy to layer and last all day.

I got the shade Jubilee, which is a lovely terracotta color and I feel it would be stunning on all skin tones. Absolutely win on this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This blush formula is amazingly beautiful. I can use this on my cheeks, eyes, lips an it looks flawless. I canu2019t wait to get more shades. This is a must have for blush lovers. You canu2019t go wrong with this one!!

reviews.review_title: Golden hour and Primadonna are a must haves!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Rosu00e9 N Brunch - neutral rosey pink

reviews.review_title: Love this product and you will too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin

reviews.review_title: This is my fave for my cosmetic bag u2764ufe0f

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Omg does this product live up to its promises?! It totally does! I love how smoothing and blurring this is, and the color is very pretty and buildable sheer coverage. I love the silky texture, and would definitely recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Yes yes yes! This is THE first cream blush that had ever worked for me and I have tried manyyyyyyy. High end and drugstore. They always end up fading as the day goes on. Iu2019ve tried Nars, Anastasia Beverly Hills, Milk, Stila, The Balm, Milani and so many more. I am so impressed! I use a stippling brush and dip it in one time. Thatu2019s enough to tap on both cheeks. And the blush stays allllll day. Itu2019s still there when I remove my makeup at night. The color is like like when your cheeks are freshly flushed from the cold. I will definitely buy more colors!!!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I got the shade Jubilee which is described as a soft terracotta shade. The formula blends seamlessly on the skin. The price is also reasonable and worth a try! This product is complimentary from Danessa Myricks

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this blush product! My skin looks so gorgeous after applying. It is kind of subtle but I definitely notice how well it looks on my skin! I definitely recommend this product, love the formula!

reviews.review_title: Perfect peachy color on any complexion!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_title: I wish I could leave it 10 stars!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: THIS BLUSH IS E.V.E.R.Y.T.H.I.N.G!! Lately, I have become obsessed with blush products in cream or liquid form because they just melt beautifully onto the skin and this product did not disappoint!! Danessa Myricks knows her stuff! I like to use my fingers to pick up some product and warm it up a bit on the back of my hand, then I take my fluffy blush brush and blend the product onto the cheeks and the results are stunning. The color pay off is absolutely amazing so using this technique work great for me. I also love how beautiful the blurring effect is. My cheeks never looked this good! Another great tip is you can apply a bit of powder foundation with a fluffy brush after using the blurring balm to soften the look of the blush a bit more.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Rosu00e9 N Brunch - neutral rosey pink
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Dry skin

I love how radiant and gorgeous my skin looks. The variety of shades goes for multiple skin tones. You need to try this one.

reviews.review_text: This is a really interesting blush. It has a similar texture to the balm powder so itu2019s very blurring and has a matte finish. Rose n Brunch is a beautiful shade. It can be built up or sheered out nicely.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin

I received the shade Dancing Queen which is a vivid plum, itu2019s a bit bright for my light to medium skintone but would be stunning on a darker skin tone. I was able to make it work by using a very light hand as the formula is extremely pigmented. Iu2019ve also found that itu2019s really really pretty as an eyeshadow! I am tempted to try out a lighter shade that would work better for my skin tone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This will be the best product you've ever used. It's beginner friendly and buildable. The shades can be applied for a light everyday wear or bold for a night out. I love how smooth it applied on my skin and how easy it was to blend out. lets not forget the blurring effect it has on the skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Okay what the heck. I did NOT expect this kind of pigment!! This out does rare beauty by a million!! I love that i can use it for everything! Face, lips, eyes I mean itu2019s insane! I love the texture and creamy ness

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This blush is gorgeous and blends in so well!! I was skeptical it would blend in properly with my fingers since I always prefer a brush but it really does! It has a medium to light amount of pigment making it super buildable. Iu2019m such a fan of this one!

reviews.review_title: Very pigmented and melts into your skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This blush is very pigmented, as a woman of color does blush is a stand out. And literally melted into your make up and it doesnu2019t look cakie on top of  foundation  . This   Blush has become a staple in my make up routine, it was complimentary from Danessa Myricks Beauty

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: When using this product, I found that I liked it a lot better than having to substitute eyeshadow for blush. As someone who has yet to own a product that works so well for blush, I was very excited to try this. I want to start this off by saying, if you like the Blurring balm powder you will LOVE THIS. Because the product is so pigmented, I have found myself at times sheering out the product when I want a natural flush. To use this, I generally rub my fingers directly into the product and lightly tap in onto my cheeks. You can use a brush but for some reason I like finger application best. Don't be mistaken though. This isn't just a blush. It's good for the eyes, nose, and even lips.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m such a blush girl so when these came out I was so excited!! They are so pigmented and vibrant! And they are buildable which I love!  I feel like the best way to use these is to warm the product up with your fingers and  then tap directly on to the cheeks or lips. Itu2019s also super lightweight! I love how when I add it to my lips it feels like Iu2019m not wearing anything all, but also it wears so long as a lip color.  Another versatile product by Danessa. We love to see it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful packaging and such a nice color. It is very pigmented and makes my eyes look so good. A little goes a long way and I like to apply it when ai go to an event or special occasion. I would recommend it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m really loving this 2-in-1 blush and lipstick. I like that itu2019s buildable, so you can either go for the natural look or a more makeup-y look. It lasts a long time and doesnu2019t move when I set it with setting powder. Fairly priced, worth it!

reviews.review_title: Melts right into my skin perfectly!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: A beautiful flushed balm that melts right into my skin. The color looks intense but on the skin it is just perfect. Its not too greasy and not too matte on my mature skin. The color didn't fade with all day wear and I never had to reapply.  Product gifted by Danessa Myricks Beauty for my honest review.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Rosu00e9 N Brunch - neutral rosey pink
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is so incredible! It isnu2019t too strong and overpowering in color, it blends out so nicely for a soft blushed look. I absolutely love it so much. It hasnu2019t caused any breakouts either which is important!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin

After applied it's not really greasy and it sets down almost to a satin powder. I like this but I don't know if I would repurchase because it performs like a lot of other cream products.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin

I have to say that these are stunning and take no effort into blending into the skin. They look so natural n pretty on the cheeks. I definitely want more shades now!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This cream is absolutely stunning. The texture is so smooth and applying it is like a blending dream. No matter how I applied it, brush or sponge and even fingers, or gave me a perfect result. Definitely recommend and I want all the colors now

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin

When I apply a bit too much product, Iu2019d like to lightly go over it with a bit of foundation over the top to help melt the products together and have a more natural appearance. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the color of this blush! It really surprised me how well it blended on over my foundation and it really had a fun vibrant color! Plus the name of the blushes are super cute too! I highly recommend getting this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cream blush  is so beautiful and pigmented! It was gifted by Danessa Myricks Beauty . Itu2019s so easy to apply and a little goes a long way. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin

This blueing balm has the best texture- silky smooth and creamy and a little goes a long way!! I love how rich and pigmented it is and how itu2019s so versatile- I can use it as a blush on the apples of my cheeks or as a lip cream too

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love it, it blends super well on the skin like butter, it has very good pigmentation and a very creamy formula. It is one of my favorite products of this 2023. I really recommend it if you are a fan of a beautiful finish on your cheekbones, very fresh and natural

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Primadonna is that girl. I love wearing her all over my face. (Eyes,cheeks,lips)  I love topping her with DMB Dew Wet Balm in Sweet Water for the perfect dewy cheeks.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been calling myself Bellini ufffcmommy when I wear this on my lips and cheeks. Last all day! ufffc Blends well, with other products. ufffcAnd most importantly look fabulous!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin

If youu2019re a dry girl like me, donu2019t worry, it still works amazingly well and since it has hyaluronic acid, your skin stays hydrated all day as well. As I mentioned above it is buildable. You can go for a wash of color or a bold look depending on how much product you use, and oh baby it lasts ALL DAY!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got the shade Bellini which is a orange and coral toned shade. the brand describes it as a peach, but I personally found it more coral like the pictures. I like setting with a coral toned blush to set because Iu2019m really oily skinned.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Rosu00e9 N Brunch - neutral rosey pink

This is a very unique formula, which can be hard to do considering how saturated the market is. I think this is going to be a very popular release and I hope they will release a wider shade range in the future!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin

Iu2019ve tried applying it various ways but personally for me, I have loved the application of using one finger to swirl and tap on product and then using a clean finger to blend out the pigment in tapping motions. This method works best  (in my opinion) her range of colors is stunning and I can see every skin tone rocking these colors! Especially dancing queen and primadonna! In image Iu2019m wearing primadonna

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_title: I need the whole shade range!!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This flush is a stunning hot fuchsia. It can be worn softly as a light wash of color or be built up to be as bold and bright as they look in panu2026 and anywhere in between! While blurring my pores and smoothing my texture, the flush plumps and nourishes my skin (thanks to the hyaluronic acid and vegan squalane) while absorbing any excess oil or moisture (thanks to the upsalite) leaving a flawless velvet satin skin like finish ud83dude0d

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin

The formula is smooth, super buildable, doesn't crease or apply unevenly over many different base products. I would recommend picking one shade that you really like and sticking with that one!

reviews.review_title: A staple in my every day routine!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am absolutely in love with the original blurring balm powder formula + this new flushed version for lips + cheeks is just as incredible as I hoped! The shade Bellini is probably my favorite at the moment of the 3 shades Iu2019ve tried (also Primadonna + Dancing Queen are stunning!). Bellini is a perfect shade for every single look and color story in my opinion. My favorite method of applying these is by tapping them into the skin with my fingers because it really melts and becomes one with the skin. I also enjoy using Danessau2019s microfiber sponges or the Elf  stipple brush for application to the cheeks. No matter what method you choose the pigment lasts all day and it feels weightless on the skin. For wearing these on the lips you can tap them on for a more blotted flush or build it up for a fully opaque matte finish. Itu2019s super comfortable on the lips since it blurs but is super thin + has great lasting power. Balm Powder Flushes has very quickly become a staple in my makeup routine because of how versatile every shade is across all skin tones + with how incredible the formula is.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin

Definitely works great with your fingers by tapping the product to blend and you could also use this as an eyeshadow, as well as a color corrector.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Rosu00e9 N Brunch - neutral rosey pink

Product gifted by Danessa Myricks Beauty for feedback

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my first product by Danessa Myricks and definitely not the last!! This blush is amazing!!! It is soft, it is buildable, it is true to color and is is indeed blurring. My textured skin feels super smooth and the product blends like a dream. I am obsessed. Complimentary from Danessa Myricks Beauty

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Rosu00e9 N Brunch - neutral rosey pink
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a beautiful shade, I am not use to use ing cream blushes but I really loved the texture and the color. This is defiantly something I would be buying again. Gifted in exchange for my honest review

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product. The texture is so enjoyable it is so smooth and flattering on the skin. I also love how buildable it is and easy to blend out. Lastly I love how natural it looks on the skin, it is a matte finish that blurs the skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really love it, is very practical that I can used for lips and cheeks too! And the color is perfect for my skin tone.. the formulation is super soft and with only a tiny amount works super good! I absolutely recommended ud83dudc95

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Porcelain skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by Danessa Myricks Beauty  This blush is beautiful. Easy to apply with buildable pigmentation.  It goes to a velvety finish on the skin that blurs imperfections. Great wear time, and looks pretty on the lips and eyes as well for a monochromatic look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love a multi-tasking product like this! Iu2019ve used it for blush, lip tint, and eyeshadow/eye base. I find this to be a wonderfully blendable formula and easy to work with on skin. I do think itu2019s a tad dry for my lips but thatu2019s the norm for most lip products on me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Loving this blush it's super pigmented, but it blends like butter!  Leaving a very natural look, I did a beautiful monochrome makeup with this product and I fell in love. It looks very pretty on the eyelids and lips too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wow! I am in love! I am a fair/light complexion and with oily combo skin. I have the color primadonna. I applied lightly with a brush on top of foundation and cru00e8me bronzer and before powder. My blush looked beautiful all day long!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This blush is soooo pigmented I absolutely love it AND it will not move at all! This is probably the best blush I have ever tried honestly Iu2019m shocked at how long it lasted. I wore it all day. Itu2019s definitely a balm consistency and it blends very well. A little goes a looooonnnggg way trust me. Iu2019m not used to so much pigment so I definitely put too much the first time lol. I canu2019t recommend this enough and I want to try more colors asap!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Danessa Myricks gifted me their new Yummy Skin Blurring Balm.. and oh my gawd, I now have another favorite in my collection! This product sinks into the skin so beautifully, and blends out like a dream with a few taps of the  fingertips. I use dabbing motions, and it never looks patchy or splotchy.  The packaging is super cute & luxurious, and the formula and shade range are incredible. Absolutely hands down recommend trying!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Wow!! This is my first time trying DM products and this blush is everything. Itu2019s so buttery and pigmented, literally blends like a dream. I have dry and textured skin and it still manages to look good on me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product as a gift for review. The color I got was dancing queen.  This is a balm/powder type formula. Oh boy, is she PIGMENTED. I did a semi heavy hand and applied with fingers and it WAS WAY TO MUCH, I literally gasped. Once I went back in with a very light hand, I loved it.it blends like a dream! It's not splotchy or patchy, it just blends and diffuses. For someone with dry skin, this is so seemless and holy grail worthy. I want to buy some of the other colors now with my own money!

reviews.review_title: Creamy, pigmented, blends like a dream!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I got shade Bellini, and itu2019s pretty much a straight up orange. Itu2019s slightly like a coral-y pink, so if you really like bright summer blush this is for you! It is a cream formula, very pigmented even just swatching on my hand, and on the skin. It blends so effortlessly. I tried on my bare skin and blended with my fingers and it melts right in beautifully. I would say use this before powder or setting your face since itu2019s a creamy formula. 10/10 recommend! Love the pigment, how quick and effortless it blends, and the feel of the product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am obsessed! This blends so easily and gives me the perfect pop of colors! I canu2019t wait to add more of the colors to my collection! Definitely recommend this one and will be repurchasing in the future!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am in love with DM products. The Yummy Skin line is fabulous. I wear the foundation almost daily and the balm is pure magic. I was really excited to try the blush, even though the color isnu2019t really u201cmeu201d. Well, first time wearing it I received tons of compliments and I absolutely love the color, finish and way it wears. A+++++.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I couldnu2019t be more obsessed!! This blush truly blurs and gives such a beautiful matte rosy look! I love using this with a full face of makeup as well as natural makeup with this is absolutely stunning!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really cute packaging. Nice bronze rose gold color. I love the balm to powder finish on the blush. Used it on my face and was stunned at how easily it blends and gives a nice natural finish. Looking forward to using it with a full face on. The powder finish makes it blend so well into the skin. Adding to my blush rotation

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: iu2019m so excited about the new addition to the yummy skin line. iu2019m obsessed with cream blushes right now and i love this formula! the pigmentation is consistent and easily blended. i love how buildable this blush is, and that it doesnu2019t disrupt the layers underneath!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This has to be one of my favorite blushes that Iu2019ve ever tried. I am a huge fan of cream blushes, and this blush lasts all day long and is the prettiest color ever. I canu2019t wait to buy more colors because this is genuinely one of my favorite products that I have ever tried.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been loving the Danesaa Myricks beauty line for the past year and this product definitely shines. The Jubilee color is beautiful and goes on so silky. It is truly a multifaceted product. I have used it on my eyes, lips, and cheeks and it is beautiful.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Such a beautiful blush im so obsessed! It's pigmented and blends out super easily which I love. It's also such a pretty shade. I love the formula too it's so unique! I can't wait to try more Danessa products. I was gifted by Danessa Myricks Beauty.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the color and texture of this balm, it is unlike anything i have! It is quite pigmented so you donu2019t need too much, it spreads really nicely on the skin! Feel like this would like a long time also. complimentary from Danessa Myricks Beauty

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is going to be THE brand of 2023 I just know it. Such an interesting product and the color is LOVELY. Balm to powder finish and stays all day. I like this for my no makeup makeup days. Cute packaging!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product was gifted to me by the company and is amazing. The pigment is absolutely incredible and a little goes a long way. It feels natural on my skin and is very buildable. Love this product for the no makeup makeup days!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Danessa Myricks gifted me this blush. This is my first time trying anything from this brand too. This cream blush is a really creamy texture that blends in the skin beautifully. I got the shade primadonna and it's like the perfect spring/summer shade. You can sheer it out or build it up which is nice too. It doesn't emphasize my texture it actually blurs a little bit of it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Wow, so pigmented!!! I got the shade u2018primadonnau2019 and itu2019s such a beautiful shade. I have fair skin and I think it would work for a wide range of skin types. All you need is a small amount, blends beautifully and lays nicely on the skin. I love this!

reviews.review_title: Best cream to powder blush ever!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product was a free gift in exchange for a honest review. I absolutely love this blush! I got the shade Jubilee which is a lovely nude rosu00e9 color. I have very fair skin and a little went a long way, the color looks gorgeous! Itu2019s more of a cream texture that sets down to a soft creamy powder. Usually I find cream to powder blushu2019s patchy and difficult to work with but not this one!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Holy pigment!!!!! Like most other Danessa products a little goes a lonnnng way! I got the shade rosu00e9 and brunch which is a stunning brighter mauve-perfect for cheeks and lips. Itu2019s creamy but dries down to a powder-like feel. Itu2019s not dewy like her other cream blushes but more natural matte. On the lips this is comfortable and not drying. I want more shades!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As soon as I tried it I was shocked like the way it just melts on your skin and gives you the perfect glow I am obsessed, the color is perfect, wears beautiful all day long, I really canu2019t tell you how much I love this, this is the perfect blush 10/10

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary from Danessa Myricks Beauty This is such a fun color! It applies not sheer, but not so pigmented at first, it is really easy to build up from just a flush of color to full pigment and its beautiful either way. Wears well with most my products so far and is pretty long lasting, and is especially pretty on lips!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This blurring balm powder - flushed by Danessa Myricks is pretty cool. The product in the pot does resemble the texture of a balm and once applied feels and looks powdery. The packaging says to apply with fingers, which does work but I found using a blush brush helped give me a more subtle color. I think I may have used too much on my cheeks the first time and it looked blotchy. My second use with a brush was so much softer and more natural looking. When applying to my lips, I liked using a lip brush to make cleaner and more precise lines around my lip. The color is buildable. I tried the primadonna color - which is a little bright and probably more appropriate for the summer or nights out. Iu2019d probably opt for a softer rose for everyday use. For reference, Iu2019ve shared a photo. Iu2019m only wearing a little foundation and the blurring balm powder on my lips and cheeks.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This blurring balm is incredible! I got the darker plum shade ( Iu2019m blonde and my skin is fair) and it really gives me that pop of color! I use it on my cheeks as blush and on my lips and the combo is amazing! I love the soft texture of the balm, it is non drying and buildable. Iu2019ve been using it every day since I got this complimentary from Danessa Myricks Beauty.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: For the price point you are receiving a lot of product! A little goes a long way! I have the golden hour and at first I thought that I would look like a clown, but I didnu2019t. The formula is smooth the color really elevates any look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The packaging is stunning! The blush - wow! I went with Prinadonna, and she is gorgeous and so creamy. I love cream blushes, and this is one of the best formulations. It blends and builds sooooo well. And it has very strong lasting power! Highly recommend! Gifted by Danessa Myricks.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The shade jubilee is stunning. I was never into cream blushes but lately I been trying different ones. This one is very pigmented , it went on very smooth. This shade looked very nice on my dark tan skin. As someone new to cream blush this was super easy to use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE!! I have the yummy skin blurring balm also and itu2019s amazing. These products never fail to be great! I love the vibrant color of Primadonna, itu2019s such a beautiful bright primo shade. These are innovative and amazing blushes!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This blurring balm complimentary from Danessa Myricks Beauty is the best addition to my daily makeup look. It's so natural, but leaves my skin looking hydrated and absolutely glowing. The perfect pop of color! Doesn't make me breakout and lasts for a very long time as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The blush has such a luxurious packaging. The shade is gorgeous and very pigmented. I love that itu2019s buildable. You can go light or theatrical for a makeup look. Iu2019m very impressed with the brand so far.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Rosu00e9 N Brunch - neutral rosey pink

reviews.review_text: This is an amazing blush! I love how creamy and richly pigmented the formula is. It blends nicely and stays on the whole day without fading away. I have it in Rose N Brunch, which is a beautiful pink shade. It looks natural on my fair complexion. Iu2019m really impressed with the quality of this blush and wanna try more products from this brand!

reviews.review_title: If youu2019re a blush lover, you need these!

reviews.review_text: I love a good punchy, vibrant, pigmented blush, and this one delivered! If you prefer a more natural flush or just a soft wash of color, go in with a light hand! Even though this is more of a mattifying blush, itu2019s not a flat matte. It still has a slight sheen and it looks so good! I will for sure be getting every single shade!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is soo creamy and blends right into the skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is my first time trying a blush/ tint type product that isn't a power. I received this for free for review purposes and wasn't sure what to expect but I love it. Amazing value since you barely need any product! Looks amazing on the cheeks, lips, a little on the nose and eyelids!  gifted by Danessa Myricks Beauty

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Omg this product is soooo pigmented and beautiful must but for sure! The color payoff on this is amazing. A little bit deff goes a long way when applying this! Will 100% recommend ! And will be for sure buying more colors

reviews.review_title: You are gonna want this in your collection!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin

I see a blurring effect because I have pores in the area i apply my blush and instantly saw the blurring effect.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin

This was gifted by Danessa Myricks Beauty, but thats not changing my thoughts on the product! I need it in every shade!!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin

reviews.review_text: I love the color of this blush and the formula is nice too, but the staying power is not quite as long as I would like. I love that I can use it to add a bit of color without foundation and it gives my skin a nice glow.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Rosu00e9 N Brunch - neutral rosey pink

reviews.review_text: I love it. I received as a gift. I got the color PRIMADONA and reminds me of the rear beauty liquid blush u201cHAPPYu201d. It  stays all day.  I got a flew compliments at work. Who doesnu2019t like a compliment? I sure do. Iu201dm happy with my choice

reviews.review_text: Iu2019m definitely in my cream blush era, but there are some key points that I look for when it comes to cream blushes, I want them to pigmented but not to much, I need them to be very easy to blend and long wearing and this one definitely is one of those, plus this color is perfect for my medium to tan skin Tone, this will be a precious color to wear during spring and summer time, danesa m never disappoints!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin

I have worn this for 12 hours and it still looks nicely pigmented, even after a long day. It is a creamy, comfortable formula. I am definitely impressed and will definitely pick up more shades in the future!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Rosu00e9 N Brunch - neutral rosey pink

reviews.review_text: The blush looks so natural on my skin and doesnu2019t make my makeup look cakey. It blurs my pores and gives an airbrushed look to my face. I love the way it goes on and a little goes a long way. I need to try more colors

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin

reviews.review_title: A must for a blush lover!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin

As I was kind if rubbing my cheeks trying to spread the product,  they became all red and I couldn't distinguish where the product was and where was my red skin. After a few minutes I could tell what and where I need to improve. Because if you rub too much you wipe the product off partially.  So it took me a few takes to find out how to apply it the best way.  Soft lightweight and creamy texture that I love a lot. Gifted by Danessa Myricks beauty.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Rosu00e9 N Brunch - neutral rosey pink

reviews.review_text: Favorite blush I have ever tried. The color is beautiful and I love the cream to powder formula. It blends like a dream. reviews.review_title: Love it for a monochromatic look! Amazing!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Rosu00e9 N Brunch - neutral rosey pink

reviews.review_text: This blurry balm flushed blush is such a pretty color! It can be used on cheeks and lips and the formula/finish is matte. I like how this blush is buildable so you can add an extra pop of color if needed!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i absolutely love this blush! I am incredibly happy with how long is lasts and how great it looks on my very light skin tone. I do not typically use blushes of this consistency, but I was very pleasantly surprised at how nicely this applies!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This balm is so so pretty and a new addition to my daily makeup routine! I love how easily and seamlessly it blends and doesnu2019t look patchy at all!!! It is so so pigmented and gives my face the right pop of color

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Oily skin

I will say if you have Fair-light skin go in with a light hand as this product builds a lot. There's quite a bit of pigment. It's even beautiful tapped onto the lips!

The only thing that made it come off my face was rubbing it with a cloth or with my cleanser/makeup remover. Am definitely interested in picking up another shade of this and would highly recommend.

reviews.review_text: I am super impressed with the pigment in this blurring balm powder that I was gifted by Danessa Myricks. I received the color rose and brunch. It is a beautiful neutral pink. The first thing I did was use my finger and apply it to my lips. It is a pretty lip color and goes on so easily. I then applied it to my cheeks. It gave me a beautiful blush color that I tapped and blended into my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This blush is my new favorite! The color is a gorgeous deep plum shade with red undertones and doesn't make me look washed out or unnatural despite being very pale. It doesn't weigh down my skin or leave any residue behind either. Gifted by danessa myricks

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m in love with Danessa Myricks products and this is no different. I love the balmy texture. You donu2019t really need a heavy hand with this product unless you want to build up the color. Itu2019s just so beautiful on the skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this blush as a gift and Iu2019m absolutely in love!! Itu2019s super creamy and looks great on my skin. It has a glowy finish and the color rose and brunch is beautiful. Itu2019s very pigmented and so easy to use. Also the packaging is gorgeous.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Rosu00e9 N Brunch - neutral rosey pink
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: amazing blush it is so pigmented and blends beautifully onto the skin. I highly recommend this blush, perfect for this upcoming spring/summer and the shade range is beautiful. It is also long lasting.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this blush! I use it as blush and eyeshadow and it goes so well with my skin complexion! I love how pigmented it is and how I can apply this over other products without this product taking care. I recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have u201cGOLDEN HOURu201d and itu2019s a super bright orange shade thatu2019s matte formula!! reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I prefer cream blush instead of powder and I love this formula. The packaging feels luxurious and its easy to apply. Itu2019s pigmented but can be sheered out and the color looks great on my tan skin. It feels weightless on and lasts all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This blush is amazing! it is a multi purpose product so you can also use it as lip stick. it gave my skin a beautiful healthy glow and it looked great applied over powder and regular foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently got to try this in the shade Dancing Queen which is described as a vivid plum. This color is so outside my norm, but it looked beautiful on the model!  So I decided to try it.  The color payoff of this is UNREAL!!!  You do not need much product at all.  It blended very nicely into the skin. Iu2019ve never used a product that went from balm to powder. Itu2019s so unique.  And the color last all day. I think this shade is going to be lovely on all skin colors. Danessa has done it again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This balm is the perfect blush to blur imperfections and give skin a radiant, flushed look without clogging pores, being ticky, or looking fake. It looks so natural and is great for my sensitive skin. I'm a huge fan! Complimentary from Danessa Myricks Beauty.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got the Rose N Brunch shade and it is gorgeous! Itu2019s very pigmented and blends out beautifully. This color does give me the perfect flushed look with out looking like a clown. I like that you can use it on your lips as well! A little goes a long way with this balm!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product. The color is such a. beautiful color that really compliments my skin tone. It is super blendable and smoothing on my skin. Itu2019s such a pretty and bold color. I also love the packaging

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this blush so much! It looks really great on my skin and I am really glad that I decided to try it. Gifted by Danessa Myricks. I recommend getting this blush if you want the perfect flushed look!

reviews.review_title: Melts in skin and pigmented /long lasting!

I didnu2019t need to mute after applied, I felt like it was the perfect amount of pigment. They are pretty matte and blurring ! No emphasis on my texture. I would definitely purchase another shade.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin

A littles goes a long way and my skin took well to it! Definitely recommend! gifted by Danessa Myricks beauty*

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I cannot believe how much I love this. I'm a blush girl. I have SO many blushes, yet I keep reaching for this one. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary from Danessa Myricks Beauty. The beautiful shade Rose n Brunch is a neutral rosey pink that really suits my light/fair skin. It gives my skin a natural flush of color that is buildable and provides my skin with a soft-focus finish. I love that it contains ingredients for hydrating my skin that keep my skin feeling nourished and hydrated throughout the day. I highly recommend this blush!

reviews.review_title: Great for dry skin with texture
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Complimentary from Danessa Myricks Beauty. This looks so good on the skin!! At first I was a bit afraid that it would accentuate my pores or texture. This blends out with ease and it looks like your skin. I loved how this applied with my fingers, brush, and beauty blender. My go-to application though was with my fingers because it was fast to apply with and didn't have to worry about deep cleansing my tools later.I tend to be lazy with my makeup application so I appreciate when anything works with my hands.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: THIS BLUSH IS KILLER!!! It blends beautifully into the skin and itu2019s so buildable whether i want a toned down look or a show stopping vibrant look! Iu2019m so obsessed, treat yourself and go buy this right now!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have literally never seen anything like this. Iu2019ve tried many blushes, and this one is so different. Itu2019s super pigmented, so a little goes a long way. However, itu2019s super easy to blend the color in, and it actually blurs!!!!! It goes on like a cream but softens into a powder. Cannot really explain it, just trust me this one is amazing!!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this blurring bomb powder from Danessa Myricks!! I got the shade, rosu00e9 and brunch, and it is the perfect color of pink! reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: These come in such fun packaging and such unusual, unique colors! I love that it helps to blur pores and smooth skin while also giving color, since a lot of people I know struggle with large pores on cheek areas where you'd apply blush. The color I chose isn't for everyday use but the formula is so great that I would! Gifted by Danessa Myricks Beauty in exchange for my honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is truly a cream blush that you can put on top of powder and it melts in effortlessly. It blurred out those little pores that I have on the outside part of my check and also on the front of the apples of cheeks. Itu2019s so good!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Rosu00e9 N Brunch - neutral rosey pink
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the first time I try anything by Danessa myricks and I am completely impressed. This blush is so creamy so blendable and so juicy I am obsessed!! I got the shades roses n brunch and itu2019s such a nice mauve shade the formula is one of the best Iu2019ve tried !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love that Danessa Myricks has decided to extend their yummy skin complexion line. I was so excited to try this yummy blush in the shade Rose n Brunch which is described as a neutral rosey pink that is good for light/fair skin. The description is accurate in that it is the perfect tone for my fair skin! It's a beautiful cream texture that glides onto my cheeks effortlessly. I prefer to build up the intensity so I swirl just the tip of my beauty blender in the component to pick up just a tiny amount of the blush. Then I press it onto my cheeks and tap it out using my sponge. I prefer to use my sponge versus a brush for this product. I've found it easier to attain a more flawless airbrushed look using the blender vs a brush. The color is lucious and dewy and it lasts on my cheeks all day long.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary from Danessa Myricks Beauty. I must say, right of the bat, this is one of my favorite brands these days. All of the products she makes are gorgeous and innovative, and this blush is no different! This cream blush is perfection. It blends into the skin beautifully, is pigmented without being overly-so. The shade I chose, Rose and Brunch is the PERFECT rosy neutral. I love the packaging and the texture is cream but not too soft. A fantastic product- and if you love blush, this is a fantastic one! 10/10

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m obsessed. The formula and texture is so smooth and is so easy to blend!! The color is soft but has a really pretty finish and I love how all the colors were showcased on different models to show the range each product has!!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin

reviews.review_title: love how this blush looks! Its very pigmented

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin

Iu2019m so glad they came out with a colored version I canu2019t wait for more shades.

reviews.review_text: This blush is stunning. Itu2019s cream by touch which turns into powder once on the skin. Itu2019s extremely pigmented and just gorgeous overall. I will be using this on my face for mono chromatic looks as itu2019s super easy to use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this new blush balm! Tbh at first when I applied it on my fingers I was surprised how pigmented it was and it looked pretty dark at first glance but it blended out really easily for a natural matte/satin look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this product. I think it works super good super pigmented and very versatile. I have been using this as a natural glow and I really like it. I definitely recommend this product and want to buy another shade

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the first product from Danessa Myricks Beauty and I have fallen in love with the brand, especially this product in particular! I got the shade Rose N Brunch and I am so in love with it! It is one of those neutral dark pinky colors that matches anything you wear during all four seasons! The product is creamy, pigmented, and the packaging is sleek! It is super easy to apply with the touch of a finger, and is super blendable! In the past I have had issues with cream blushes not blending well, but I had no issues with this one! I also love that it can be easily used on your lips! This is one of those cream based products I would recommend to someone just starting out with makeup, as well as to everyone else!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Rosu00e9 N Brunch - neutral rosey pink
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary from Danessa Myricks Beauty. I was very excited to try out this product since I have been loving blush and I loved how this felt on my skin. It was very pigmented and was super easy to apply.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I honestly was surprisingly shocked on how much I like this product. This is the perfect  color blush for me. Iu2019m always iffy of makeup cause a lot of things dry me out or I look flaky but it doesnu2019t do it. Highly recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I ordered Dancing Queen and while it's too dark for me to use as a blush on my light skin (may be usable during the times I have a deep spray tan) it is so pretty as a lip color. I love the blurring effect as it looks so soft on lips! I used a liner with it to make it look polished. I think this shade would be SO pretty on deeper skin tones and am excited to see if it will work when I get a spray. Gifted by Danessa Myricks Beauty.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recieved this complimentary from dynessa myricks. This is such a gorgeous plum colored blush! I love the color that I have as it really gives me a nice flush on the cheeks. I love how it just melds into my skin but gives almost a doll like finish too since its matte. This has definitely became a lovely favorite!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have color Rose N Brunch which is vey beautiful mauvy pink suitable for light skin tones. Itu2019s so nice that you can use them both on your lips, cheeks and even eyes. And big shout out to Danessa tan on promo photos you can see all the shades swatched on 6 different skin depths. Thatu2019s so incredibly helpful.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Danessa Myricks yummy skin blurring balm powder is perfect for your cheeks, and lips.  The shade I have is rose brunch itu2019s the perfect shade it applies effortlessly I feel so beautiful as I tap my fingers and apply my blush higher since Iu2019m on my 30u2019s but I highly recommend this blush over my expensive one Iu2019ve used for awhile.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin

Itu2019s very easy to sheer this blush out and also easy to get a really pigmented impact for darker complexions or more dramatic looks. I know that this blush is going to go far and may be the next viral sensation!

It has good staying power and I noticed very minimal fading at the end of the day, maybe a little bit but the blush was definitely still there. I'm now eyeing Rose N brunch and Primadonna for my collection! / gifted by Danessa Myricks Beauty
